trans-unit.source: Apple removed the OpenSSL headers in El Capitan, so you’ll have to set some environment variables before installing
trans-unit.target: Apple removed the OpenSSL headers in El Capitan, so you’ll have to set some environment variables before installing

trans-unit.source: Command-line tool to sniff Puzzle & Dragons data.
trans-unit.target: Command-line tool to sniff Puzzle & Dragons data.

trans-unit.source: Padsniff can be used as either a cli:
Padsniff depends on mitmproxy’s transparent proxying capabilites. Follow their instructions to set up your computer for proxying.
trans-unit.target: Padsniff depends on mitmproxy’s transparent proxying capabilites. Follow their instructions to set up your computer for proxying.

trans-unit.source: Padsniff depends on mitmproxy’s transparent proxying capabilities. Follow their instructions to set up your computer for proxying.
trans-unit.target: Padsniff depends on mitmproxy’s transparent proxying capabilities. Follow their instructions to set up your computer for proxying.

trans-unit.source: Padsniff includes a pretty heavy list of dependencies, including lxml and cryptography. You’ll need to install some of their dependencies via your package manager.
trans-unit.target: Padsniff includes a pretty heavy list of dependencies, including lxml and cryptography. You’ll need to install some of their dependencies via your package manager.

trans-unit.source: Padsniff requires Python 3.5+. Install it with your package manager or using pyenv.
trans-unit.target: Padsniff requires Python 3.5+. Install it with your package manager or using pyenv.

trans-unit.source: See the device setup guide to learn how to set up your phone to proxy through padsniff, and the usage guide for more advanced usage.
trans-unit.target: See the device setup guide to learn how to set up your phone to proxy through padsniff, and the usage guide for more advanced usage.

trans-unit.source: See the suggested build environment page if you’re having trouble getting pyenv to work.
trans-unit.target: See the suggested build environment page if you’re having trouble getting pyenv to work.

trans-unit.source: This will also set up your environment to support click, the library that powers padsniff’s command line interface.
trans-unit.target: This will also set up your environment to support click, the library that powers padsniff’s command line interface.

trans-unit.source: This will install the testing dependencies – padsniff uses pytest for unit testing – and install padsniff in editable mode.
trans-unit.target: This will install the testing dependencies – padsniff uses pytest for unit testing – and install padsniff in editable mode.
